channel.title: CVE Feed for Artica PFMS -- Pandora FMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Artica PFMS -- Pandora FMS

item.title: CVE-2023-0828|2024-09-23T15:20:41.948Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Syslog Section of Pandora FMS allows attacker to cause that users cookie value will be transferred to the attackers users server. This issue affects Pandora FMS v767 version and prior versions on all platforms.

item.title: CVE-2023-24518|2024-09-23T14:57:35.149Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: A Cross-site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Pandora FMS allows an attacker to force authenticated users to send a request to a web application they are currently authenticated against. This issue affects Pandora FMS version 767 and earlier versions on all platforms.
